channel.title: A starting point?
channel.description:
Hey Mopar dudes :P.
I need a new and unused starting point if possible. I feel like I'm copying other popular servers if I have the same starting spot.
Here's a possibility.
[center][img]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb23/MackMopar/PestControlStartingPoint.jpg[/img][/center]
The only foreseeable drawback is the cramped feeling. Also, I'd need something like a 377 client to get PC.
Post your ideas, thoughts and feedback. :)

item.title: A starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

Nuuhhhh, your idea was on islands :o

Read full topic

item.title: A starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:6, topic:163841”]Well, you could end up in a black area, and a choice box would come up and offer something like…

Mage[Varrock]
Warrior[Falador]
Ranger[Canfis]

Also, Budda… It’s not exactly like yours :o[/quote]

Yeah ok, thats EXACTLY like my idea.

Read full topic

item.title: A starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Du_Thelduin Du Thelduin
item.description:
@Du_Thelduin wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:6, topic:163841”]Well, you could end up in a black area, and a choice box would come up and offer something like…

Mage[Varrock]
Warrior[Falador]
Ranger[Canfis]

Also, Budda… It’s not exactly like yours :o[/quote]

Ahhh… I see. So basically your saying you can choose what type of combat or skill you’d like to train from there. Like:

Voice from above: Choose your skill:

[Skills here]

Read full topic

item.title: A starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Du_Thelduin Du Thelduin
item.description:
@Du_Thelduin wrote:

Thanks for your feedback.

It would be a good idea, do you mean portals as in portals in the PC game or portals as in creating them?

Read full topic

item.title: A starting point?
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:2, topic:163841”]Atleast you’re not asking for programming help.

Here’s an idea… You pick which one you go to… You’d end up in a random area, and there’d be three portals… Each leading to a different place, when you click one it would ask if you were ready to go there, once there you’d be unable to go to the other three places, and maybe even be unable to use certain skills.[/quote]

This sounds a LOT like my idea I told you guys a few months back.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

That’s an interesting idea.
